title: Particulate matter exposure may increase the risk of irritable bowel syndrome: a large-scale prospective study based on the UK Biobank
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, 11,846-854
DOI: 10.1039/D3EN00650F, Paper
Yan Ran, Jian Lei, Laifu Li, Lianli Wang, Yating Sun, Lin Mei, Fangchen Ye, Fei Dai
Long-term exposure to PM10 and PM2.5 increases the risk of IBS, especially PM2.5.
